fields.description: This is more a question than a bug so far. Sometimes, windows open twice when interacting with the UI too fast. On native Android, this can be prevented by using {{singleTop}} on the activity, but as far as I know, all windows on Titanium are the same  "TiBaseActivity" so this would probably not work. We currently guard this with open/close flags but would like to see a more solid solution.
fields.summary: Android: Prevent window from opening twice?
